summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4637 lux), and cloud levels (up 564 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1494 m), light levels (up 6934 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 563.7m lower than yesterday, 1059.4m lower than past week, 1493.6m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1309.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2370m and 2800m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Drizzle or light rain possible, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
